restlib.impl

Class CodePointMatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • restlib.impl.CodePointMatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Predicate<Integer>

    @Immutable
public abstract class CodePointMatcher
extends Object
implements Predicate<Integer>
    A Predicate for determining the true or false value of any Java Integer code point value.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static CodePointMatcher ANY
      Matches any code point.
      static CodePointMatcher NONE
      Matches no code points.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CodePointMatcher and(CodePointMatcher other)

      abstract boolean apply(Integer input) 
      static CodePointMatcher fromCharacterPredicate(Predicate<Character> predicate)
      Returns a CodePointMatcher that matches any characters predicate matches and always returns false for supplementary code points.

      Returns a CodePointMatcher that matches any code points in a given range (inclusive).

      Returns a CodePointMatcher that matches any code points in a given range (inclusive).

      Return a Predicate<CharSequence> that returns true if a character sequence contains only matching code points.

    • Method Detail

      • anyOf

        public static CodePointMatcher anyOf(CharSequence sequence)
        Returns a CodePointMatcher that matches any code point in the given CharSequence
        Parameters:
        sequence - a non-null CharSequence
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if sequence is null.

      • fromCharacterPredicate

        public static CodePointMatcher fromCharacterPredicate(Predicate<Character> predicate)
        Returns a CodePointMatcher that matches any characters predicate matches and always returns false for supplementary code points.
        Parameters:
        predicate - a non-null Predicate<Character>
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if predicate is null.

      • inRange

        public static CodePointMatcher inRange(CharSequence start,
                       CharSequence finish)
        Returns a CodePointMatcher that matches any code points in a given range (inclusive).
        Parameters:
        start - a non-null code point CharSequence
        finish - a non-null code point CharSequence
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either start or finish are null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if either start or finish are not single Unicode code points, or if finish is not greater than start.

      • inRange

        public static CodePointMatcher inRange(int start,
                       int finish)
        Returns a CodePointMatcher that matches any code points in a given range (inclusive).
        Parameters:
        start - a valid Integer code point
        finish - a valid Integer code point
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If either start or finish are not valid Unicode code points or if finish is not greater than start.

      • noneOf

        public static CodePointMatcher noneOf(CharSequence sequence)
        Returns a CodePointMatcher that matches any code point not in the given CharSequence
        Parameters:
        sequence - a non-null CharSequence
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if sequence is null.

        public CodePointMatcher and(CodePointMatcher other)
        Returns a CodePointMatcher that matches any code point matched by both this matcher and other.
        Parameters:

        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if other is null.
